meta.content:
COVID Meal Program (PDF)
March 17, 2020
N-K Parents,
In light of the outbreak of COVID-19, we are pleased to provide all of our students with the opportunity to have a daily, free school-provided breakfast and lunch for the foreseeable future.
Our nutrition staff will prepare and package the grab-and-go meals, and our...

Dropping off and picking up students

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:31.5pt; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

img.alt: COVID Meal Program preview image (click for PDF)

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: March 17, 2020

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: N-K Parents,

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: In light of the outbreak of COVID-19, we are pleased to provide all of our students with the opportunity to have a daily, free school-provided breakfast and lunch for the foreseeable future.

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: Our nutrition staff will prepare and package the grab-and-go meals, and our transportation and support staff will deliver the meals to designated pick up and delivery points and along our existing bus routes, on weekdays.

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: Those locations and pick up times are:

li.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: The loading dock at the back of the secondary building in Northwood (weekdays from 9:00 to 9:30 AM)

li.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: The West bus stop in Kensett (weekdays from 7:30 to 8:00 AM)

li.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: The East bus stop in Kensett (weekdays from 7:30 to 8:00 AM)

li.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: Along the regular routes for all of our rural bus routes at your usual morning school pick up time (yes, we will deliver to your door if you are on a rural route)

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: To participate, please do the following ASAP and tell us that you want to receive a meal bundle so we have an accurate count for each day’s meals:

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

li.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: Call the 7-12 building at 324-2142 ext 100, or the PK-6 building at 324-1127 ext 200 (or email Clara at
chelgeland@nkvikings.com
or Tina at
tjohnson@nkvikings.com
) by 9:00 AM and tell us:

li.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: Your name, and the number/names of the students you’re calling to reserve meals for (e.g. “This is Jane Doe, and I would like 2 meal bundles for my daughters Jill and Jodi”)

li.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: Where the meal should go, or be delivered
(e.g. “We’re on the #4 Bus Route” or “We’ll get them at the West Bus stop in Kensett”)

li.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: Remind us if your child has a food allergy

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: 2. Then, daily, either go to your in-town pick up location at the designated time, or

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: wait for the morning delivery if you live on a rural bus route

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: 3. Repeat the call-in process at least weekly, in order to ensure your child/ren have meals

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: We are starting meal pick up and delivery this Friday, March 20, so if you want to participate we need you to call or email by 9:00 AM this Thursday, March 19. If no one answers, please leave a message with the needed information and you will still be included in the next day’s meal count.

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: We hope that many families will take advantage of this free daily meal bundle opportunity.

p.style: border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt
border:medium none; margin-top:0in; margin-right:.5in; margin-bottom:.0001pt; margin-left:.5in; margin:0in 0in 0.0001pt

span.span: Northwood-Kensett Schools

a.title: E-mail this article to a friend.

p.style: text-align: center;
p.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
